title: When Calls the Heart 2013 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
When Calls The Heart is the story of Elizabeth Thatcher , a young teacher who is accustomed to a luxurious life in high society and see your routine change when she is sent to work in a school located in a poor city, located in the region of mining coal in the west of the country . The place is controlled by the firm hand widows Abigail and Frances . A young teacher is determined to prove to his family that has the willpower needed to build her life alone , but ends up having to deal with their own fears and insecurity . When Elizabeth finds the diary of her deceased Aunt Elizabeth , she learns that her stories are alike and that her aunt was also a teacher and fell in love with a Canadian official . Inspired by the feats of his aunt, the girl decides to live his new adventure , using the journal as his guide , with the help of a family friend and one Canadian officer.
